Series II. Personnel: Vice President and Director: Robert M. Steed Files
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records

The General Office Files include a range of topics handled by Human Resources and Personnel including changes in employment law; medical and life insurance; leave policies; other benefits such as education reimbursement, day care and adoption; fair hiring practices; compensation and pensions; the movement of staff within the organization; and staff surveys.
